column2: BRIEF-Koppers Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.81 May 3 (Reuters) - Koppers Holdings Inc: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.85 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $4.13, REVENUE VIEW $1.78 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FOR 2018, COMPANY ANTICIPATES CAPITAL EXPENDITURES IN RANGE OF $65 MILLION TO $75 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
